name: Endarkening Prototype
description:
Endarkening is a fantasy RPG with a twist; The player characters are monsters, and the enemies are twisted versions of the more common protagonist species including elves, dwarves, and even humans. The story and society of this new world reflect these changes in new and interesting ways.

Endarkening takes place in a fresh fantasy world with plenty of rich history and characters to explore. The player is tasked with exploring the region of Darkenia, along with its greatest mystery: the ancient temples that have been there since its creation. These temples may be the key to getting answers to many of the mysteries of this strange world, and they certainly hold even greater mysteries within.
